Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a pale-red pottery jar, the fabric is relatively coarse and contains a number of small white inclusions, the exterior is covered with a burnished cream-coloured slip and remains of three lines of red-brown painted hieratic text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393629) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393629)
